categories.title: Full Art - SFW
categories.subtitle: Full-color illustration (incl. shadings) · SFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Detailed, full-color illustration - bring your character to life! Perfect as a wallpaper, poster, or heartfelt gift for your beloved ones!

categories.title: Full Art - NSFW
categories.subtitle: Full-color illustration (incl. shadings) · NSFW (18+) · digital / traditional
categories.description: Detailed, kinky illustrations making your wildest and darkest dreams come true - at least as a piece of art!

categories.title: Reference Sheets
categories.subtitle: Price depends on character complexity / number of views. · digital only
categories.description: A complete overview of your fursona including every single detail (accessories, markings), mainly used by Suitmakers and other artists.

categories.title: Badges
categories.subtitle: incl. laminating, die-cutting & keychain eyelet · digital / traditional
categories.description: Wearable art pieces made for conventions or everyday use. Badges are laminated and cut to shape, often used for identification or just to show off your character.

categories.title: Sticker Packs
categories.subtitle: Shadings will add +2€ / sticker · Bundled as sticker pack (on request) · SFW / NSFW · digital only
categories.description: Let’s create your very own personal sticker pack for messengers like Telegram. Any emotion or expression — including NSFW — is possible!

categories.title: Prints
categories.subtitle: Physical items · Various designs available (see gallery) · Custom designs on request.
categories.description: The good old evergreens every furry needs: physical stickers and buttons — perfect to decorate your bag, trade at conventions, or stick to that lantern right outside your door!

categories.title: Sketches
categories.subtitle: Quick sketch style · SFW / NSFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Not sure how your idea might turn out? Let’s explore it together with a quick sketch first!

categories.title: Line Art
categories.subtitle: Clean lines, without coloring · SFW / NSFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Clear, clean line art — ready for you to colorize, or simply enjoy as it is. Great if you want to add your own creative touch.

categories.title: Logos & Tribals
categories.subtitle: Custom symbol or mark for use as wall-, car-, body-tattoo etc. · b/w or colored · digital only
categories.description: Unique logos and tribal designs made just for you — whether for your wall, your car, or even yourself. Disclaimer: I won’t be the one sticking them on!
